Content.Text:
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <PARENT>. *yawn* ...I'm still kinda
sleepy.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm gonna go play with <CHILD_NAME_W>!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh, do I wanna catch bugs, or do I wanna play
tag...?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, what should I do for fun today?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <PARENT>. Are you working today, too?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Farms are big, huh? There's rivers and
mountains and everything! Lots of stuff to do.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*yawn* I played a lot today. Now I'm all tired...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <PARENT>. You done with work today?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Can we play? I'm not... *yawn* ...not tired...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, it's a real pretty day out, huh?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's raining. I'm just gonna stay home and play.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's hot today. I could go for a swim in the river.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining. I'm just gonna stay home and play.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's so pretty, I'm gonna go for a mountain
hike!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining. I'm just gonna stay home and play.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's all sunny out, so I wanna play outside...but
it's cooold.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at the snow. I'm gonna wait till it all piles
up and then make a big snowman. Can I borrow
a carrot, <PARENT>?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I probably shouldn't go outside today, huh?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If it keeps snowing, is our house gonna get all
buried?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, is it true there's, like, spirits living around
here? Have you seen 'em? I wanna see 'em.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was chasing a rabbit the other day, and I saw
this weird kid.
<PAGE>
He had glasses, and he was just STARING at the
rabbit. Like, REALLY staring.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard some grownups in town talking about
some nice old lady who used to live around
here.
<PAGE>
She taught you how to farm, huh? She must've
been a good teacher, 'cause you're a great
farmer!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this really it? Is this the top of the mountain?
...Whew! Man, I feel great!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's a lotta bugs around here. And...I think I
saw some rare butterfly or something.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a lotta bugs around here. And...maybe
some kinda rare butterfly, I think.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hear there's some really huge beetle around
here.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I saw a raccoon dog the other day. It was sooo
cute!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those are real pretty flowers. A guy named
Giorgio grows 'em? Is he, like, a flower shop
guy?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like coming here 'cause of all the bugs. Bugs
are cool!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always hear, like, a water wheel or something
around here. I wanna find it and see what it
looks like.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always hear a water wheel or something around
here. I wanna find it and see what it looks like.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's lots of fun stuff all around a farm, huh?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where are you going, <PARENT>?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, do you want to play with me sometime?
You should take a break or something!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey <PARENT>, can we take a family trip
someplace?
<PAGE>
It'd be real fun!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <PARENT>? When I grow up, can I help with
your work?
<PAGE>
I could water all the seeds and feed all the
animals!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Were me and <CHILD_NAME_W> born at the same
time?
<PAGE>
Can I be the big brother anyway? She makes a
better little sister, doesn't she?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I grow up, I'm gonna be a farmer too!
<PAGE>
I'll sell my fruits and veggies in all the other
towns and buy all kinds of rare stuff to bring
back here!
<PAGE>
And then I'll sell the rare stuff around town. It's
gonna be so cool!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you can buy all kinds of stuff at the Trade
Depot, right? Can I go there with you next
time?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When me and <CHILD_NAME_W> get big enough to
help with the work, that'll make you not as busy,
right?
<PAGE>
It'd be a lot of fun, all of us working together on
the farm.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Wow, thank you! These are the coolest!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> for me?
Cool, thanks, I love it!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks! You know all my favorite stuff, huh?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Th-thanks, I guess...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ugh, you wanna give me this? I don't like it...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Ugh...I don't want that! I hate those!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I love these, especially when they're shiny! 
<PAGE>
You know all about my favorite stuff.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, it's...shiny! Thanks!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Th-thank you...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Th-thank you...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Th-thank you...
Let's not give him a present right now.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Uh-uh. You can't just ignore me all the time
and then hand me stuff and make it better.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Didn't you just give me something?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Wow, this's my birthday present, huh?! Thank
you!
<PAGE>
I love this so much! I'm so happy right now. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is this for my birthday?! Thanks, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
This is great! I'm so happy. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a birthday present, right? Thank you.
<PAGE>
Cool, you got it just right!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a birthday present, huh? Thanks.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, is this a birthday present? Th-thanks, I
guess...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wait, this is for my birthday? This
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>? Aw, man, this
present sucks.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Aww, man, I hate these!
Worst birthday ever!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh, shiny! This is a birthday present, right?
Thank you!
<PAGE>
You know all my favorite stuff.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's real shiny! Is this a birthday present?
Thank you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a birthday present for me? Um, thanks...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, it's a rabbit! Wonder what's going on inside
his little bunny head...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, this doesn't bite, does it?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's an ermine! Look how cute it is!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's staring at me... I'm kinda scared...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wanna touch it, but that beak looks real sharp.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's staring at me... I'm kinda scared...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello... Hello...? This thing talks, right?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's cute!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, is this some kind of weird-looking rabbit?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, look at the cute little chick.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wanna touch it, but that beak looks real sharp.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>, heel! Hmmm? How come you
never listen?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <CHARANAME0>. You're too fat. You gotta
exercise!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>, heel. ...Good, you're a good
dog.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <CHARANAME0>. You're too fat. You gotta
exercise!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0>, you're always cute.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <CHARANAME0>, aren't you getting kinda
fat? You oughtta exercise some more.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHARANAME0> has a nice coat.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <CHARANAME0>, aren't you getting kinda
fat? You oughtta exercise some more.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks! It'd be cool if we got candy for the
Flower Fair too!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, that's a real pretty feather, huh?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that? I don't really want it. Maybe you
should give it to <CHILD_NAME_W>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh, nice wrapping! What's inside?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that a present for me? What is it?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know what day it is?
<PAGE>
It's your birthday!  Happy birthday, <PARENT>! I
love you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know what day it is?
<PAGE>
It's your birthday!  Happy birthday, <PARENT>! I
love you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know what day it is?
<PAGE>
It's your birthday!  Happy birthday, <PARENT>! I
love you!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
How come you never talk to me anymore? We're
a family...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love the safari, 'cause I love animals.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like that there's no cages here, and the animals
can run around free.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
They don't let you take animals home here,
right? 'Cause I want some...

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I grow up, I wanna dress like that and
work like you, <PARENT>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I grow up, I wanna dress like that and
work like you, <PARENT>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I grow up, I wanna dress like that and
work like you, <PARENT>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that outfit looks like a kung fu costume!
Whooachaaa! Ha! Ya! Hi ya ha!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that coat's color. When I grow up, I'm
gonna buy a lot of blue clothes!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that raincoat's color. When I grow up, I'm
gonna buy a lot of blue clothes!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that jacket's color. When I grow up, I'm
gonna buy a lot of blue clothes!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the color of that skirt. I think it looks good
on you, <PARENT>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that looks like a party outfit! I want one!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you warm in that, <PARENT>?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're all dressed up like a prince! Let me
wear that!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you look like a noble! I wanna be a noble!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, you look like a cook! Cooks are cool! I
wanna wear that.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you're really a ninja? I wanna be a ninja!
Let's both do our training together!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, there's a cat! Hey, play with me!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, there's a dog! Hey, play with me!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, there's a bear! Hey, play with me!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, there's a panda! Hey, play with me!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, there's a penguin! Hey, play with me!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that looks so cool! I wanna wear it, but

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a nice blue hat. I want one!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a nice blue hat. I want one!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice blue hat. I want one!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, there's a word for people who wear hats like

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, those are cool goggles.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, when did you get crowned, <PARENT>?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, you look like a pirate! Let's play pirate! Yo

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that mask for?! You look like a hero!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...<PARENT>. Zzz...

I don't...feel good today...

I'm getting sleepy... Just gonna hit the hay...

Ooh, what should I do for fun today?
